item.title: Making Logs Awesome - Elasticsearch in the Cloud using Docker
item.description: Logs are boring. It used to be the only time you’d be looking at your application logs was when something went wrong. Logs filled up disk space until they rotated out of existence. …but now businesses are increasingly focused on using data to drive decisions. Which advert leads to the highest click-through rates? How did that last website change affect user retention? What customer devices should our website support? Guess where the answers lie?
